reviewtext: The fit is both tight and comfortable; very usable on pretty much any exercise machine.  Earbuds aren't an option for me given the weird geometry of my ears, and these are just perfect.  The folding design works well in a gym bag, too.Plenty of bass, and more than enough volume when driven through my cheap MP3 player.  I wouldn't mistake these for my dearly-departed Grado SR60s, but they're half the price and much more portable.I had a pair of these in the early '90s, and loved them back then too.
